item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 7
item.description:
Issued at 2100Z SUN SEP 07 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   7
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
2100Z SUN SEP 07 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 15.2N  39.1W AT 07/2100Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST-NORTHWEST OR 295 DEGREES AT  13 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  984 MB
EYE DIAMETER  30 NM
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  70 KT WITH GUSTS TO  85 KT.
64 KT....... 25NE  25SE  25SW  25NW.
50 KT....... 40NE  40SE  40SW  40NW.
34 KT....... 80NE  80SE  80SW  80NW.
12 FT SEAS..140NE 120SE 120SW 140NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 15.2N  39.1W AT 07/2100Z
AT 07/1800Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 14.9N  38.5W
 
FORECAST VALID 08/0600Z 15.8N  40.5W
MAX WIND  75 KT...GUSTS  90 KT.
64 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
50 KT... 50NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
34 KT... 90NE  90SE  90SW  90NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 08/1800Z 16.5N  42.8W
MAX WIND  85 KT...GUSTS 105 KT.
64 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
50 KT... 50NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
34 KT... 90NE  90SE  90SW  90NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 09/0600Z 17.2N  45.2W
MAX WIND  95 KT...GUSTS 115 KT.
64 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
50 KT... 60NE  50SE  50SW  60NW.
34 KT...100NE  90SE  90SW 100NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 09/1800Z 18.0N  47.7W
MAX WIND 100 KT...GUSTS 120 KT.
50 KT... 70NE  60SE  60SW  70NW.
34 KT...110NE 100SE 100SW 110NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 10/1800Z 19.0N  52.0W
MAX WIND 100 KT...GUSTS 120 KT.
50 KT... 80NE  65SE  65SW  80NW.
34 KT...130NE 110SE 110SW 130NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 11/1800Z 19.5N  55.5W
MAX WIND 100 KT...GUSTS 120 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 12/1800Z 19.5N  60.0W
MAX WIND 100 KT...GUSTS 120 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 15.2N  39.1W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 08/0300Z
 
FORECASTER STEWART
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
